title: The Hunter Biden Scandal Explodes (Ep 1530)
description:
Incredible new video emerges exposing the most radical Biden administration nominee yet. In this episode, I discuss the troubling video and I also address the dangerous new tactic the left is employing to crush freedom and liberty. 

News Picks:


Fact-checking the “fact-checkers.”


The Hunter Biden scandal isn’t going away. 

Joe Biden’s nominee to head the ATF has trouble defining what an “assault weapon” is.


The “woke” industrial complex.

Bernie Sanders is a limousine socialist.
